pages.text: $(li)The Crank is an analog $(l:patchouli:redstone/vanilla/lever)Lever$(/l).$(br)$(li)This block can be placed on the floor and walls.

$(li)The strong of the redstone signal emitted by the Crack depends of the position of the lever inside of it.$(br)$(li)The Crank has 17 different possitions knowing that there is a position that does not emit a redstone signal.$(br)$(li)It can be turned clockwise right clicking on it or counterclockwise shift + right clicking on it.
